    Buzz on a rescue mission to save him. Maneuver through 15 3-D worlds and 
    battle Emperor Zurg and his robot army. Get ready, Space Ranger. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s time

    Game Features:
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

    * High-resolution 3-D graphics and immersive sound. 
 
    * 15 immense worlds to explore, including five intense Boss battles.

    * A full arsenal! Rocket jet boots, grappling hook, cosmic shield, and more. 

    * Original character voices from the movie. 

    * Supports most 3-D accelerator cards. 

    What was ripped?
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    Avi's and music had to go this time.
